name: Eli Wallach
alma_mater: University of Texas at Austin  (B.A.)  City College of New York  (M.Ed.)   Neighborhood Playhouse School of the Theatre
notable_works: ''The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly'', ''The Magnificent Seven'', ''The Godfather Part III'', ''Batman (TV series)
